snippet: A three-alarm fire around Pier 17 sent plumes of smoke billowing over Lower Manhattan, obscuring parts of the Brooklyn Bridge and causing hundreds of people to flee a crowded shopping pavilion.
abstract: A three-alarm fire around Pier 17 sent plumes of smoke billowing over Lower Manhattan, obscuring parts of the Brooklyn Bridge and causing hundreds of people to flee a crowded shopping pavilion.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and COLIN MOYNIHAN

headline.main: Fire Causes Smoke and Panic at the South Street Seaport
headline.print_headline: Fire Causes Smoke and Panic at a Manhattan Pier
